page.title: 08Education
page.content: A voluntary{play school}is held on two mornings a week to help children learn to play together. Children go to our school at 5 years old and stay till aged 11. There are 32 children,and part time teacher,clerk and dinner assistants.The school day starts at 9.00am and ends at 3.00pm for infants and 3.30 for junior classes. The school is approx. 120years old and still has outside toilets.A new school was planned in recent years but never built and there is always some threat of such small village schools being closed for economy. School is a social centre for the village as there is an active PTA and social functions are held as well as a carol sevice ,concerts etc. At age 11 children transfer to the {secondary schools}in Buxton.
